ComicInfo.Title: Day of Blood Part Two of Five
ComicInfo.Summary: Day of Blood Part Two of Five: On Qo'nos, Sisko and Worf advance on the Spire of confront Kahless while dealing with the tension between them. In orbit, Scotty, Spock, and Descheeni lead the Theseus against Romulan Bloodwings. Crusher, Sela, and the Orion attempt to save Martok from an assassination attempt. Data and Lore search for Korath who may have a weapon that can be used against Kahless. Ro, Sato, and T'Lir face off against Red Path soldiers. Paris and Torres race to try to repair the Defiant to help in the battle against Kahless' army.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-14 09:30:08. [CVDB1005258] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:00:34. [Issue ID 2559985]
